text: Baby It's You is a 1983 American romantic comedy-drama movie directed by John Sayles and starring Rosanna Arquette, Vincent Spano, Joanna Merlin, Leora Dana, Bill Raymond, Liane Curtis, Matthew Modine, Robert Downey Jr.. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1983 comedy-drama movies Category:1983 romantic comedy movies Category:1983 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by John Sayles Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in New Jersey
title: Baby It's You (movie)
